text:
Train in live labs. Hack purpose built environments. Level up where it matters. From individual contributors to global teams, OffSec powers cybersecurity at scale.

(Fortinet, 2024 Cybersecurity Skills Gap Report)
Learn One delivers focused, end-to-end cybersecurity training
A complete learning experience that combines instruction, practice, and validation to develop job ready skills for modern security roles.
Includes one year of access to one 200 or 300-level course, the associated labs, and two exam attempts
Flexible access to OffSec training, labs, and content in one subscription
Industry respected certifications that prove real world security skills
Guided learning paths that build practical skills from fundamentals to advanced
Empowering learners with a community of support
Our community members connect, communicate and collaborate on all things cybersecurity.
Join our communitySkill gaps have real consequences
The comprehensive platform for building cyber-resilient teams
This isn't passive video learning. It's readiness training that builds muscle memory in high-pressure, real-world environments.
Unlimited OffSec Learning Library access with flexible terms and volume discounts available
Shape your dedicated ranges to match your organization's environmentâ€” your technology, your vulnerabilities, your attack vectors.
Develop the skills your offensive team needs to be attack-ready against cyber threats
Mitigate risk and protect your organization through extensive cyber defense strategies
Prepare for the latest threats by staging team face-offs in live-fire tournaments
- We created Kali Linux, the world's most used offensive security toolkit
- We built OSCP, the gold standard in penetration testing certifications
- We train professionals to think like attackers and operated with precision
